title: 148864133.for A Limited Time
excerpt: When a business offers a discount for today only, it doesn’t mean they can’t afford to offer you a discount tomorrow.

children.text: When a business offers a discount for today only, it doesn’t mean they can’t afford to offer you a discount tomorrow.
It merely means that by creating an artificial sense of urgency, they’ve found a way to encourage
to take advantage of what’s seemingly available right now.
